content.detailedDescription:
I was driving around with a friend who took pictures of us.
as i checked the pics later at home i noticed a ball of red light out of the window, which didnt appear in the next pic only taken a moment later on.
i and him didnt recognize it at all while driving
content.summary: Orb(s) only seen in cellphone after reviewing pictures later

content.detailedDescription: We were watching a huge drone - we assume it's military as we are not able to locate a similar craft on the web. it flew silently over our house and as we watched it fly away an object appeared out of nowhere and appeared to be on a collision course, the object emitted an intense white light (shooting east) that sort of shimmered and then poof it was nowhere to be seen.... we saw the drone still in the sky flying west, but searching the sky the large oval was just gone. no where. we were like wtf did we just see? first off the drone was super strange looking. as it approached it looked like a 747, but when it got closer, it was obvious it was not. we estimate the drone to be about the size of a train tank car, with two large rectangle-ish objects on each side of the craft behind the first set of wings. the cylinder was uniform and pointed, with one set of wings, and a set of tail wings. it was silver/gray with no observable openings or engines/props - and it was dead silent. the oval object appeared to the right at about 40 degrees from the horizon as the drone was flying west away from us.  we had been observing the drone several minutes and we are both confident the drone was alone in the sky when the orb-ish object appeared suddenly extremely bright for about 20 seconds then with a bit of a shimmer (reminiscent of russian meteor film) it was completely gone. we both were and still are amazed and perplexed at what we saw. amanda drew pictures of what she saw.
content.summary: While watching a huge

content.detailedDescription:
I was stationed as a marine at 29 palms ca.  my mos was a 1371; combat engineer.  we had been assigned to build the marine corps largest air strip several miles (6 miles) away from the "main-base" at 29, called camp wilson.  this was a massive job (six months to build) requiring hundreds of pieces of heavy equipment, trucks, marines and navy seabees.

each day we would be shuttled from our barracks on "main-side" to camp wilson...  after several weeks we were leaving more and more equipment at wilson, so we built a "guard-shack" to accommodate a couple guys in sleeping bags to stay the night and "guard" the dirt.  (side note, we were seven miles from main-side and at least 10+ miles from the nearest road.  the base was 100% surrounded by a barbed-wire fence as well.  my point is there is no way anyone or anything could get out there without being spotted; a car, truck or jeep would easily leave a dust trail and be heard, the desert is not easy to navigate and walking is out of the question!). when you googleearth 29 palms and go to camp wilson you'll see where i'm talking about.

so i was an e4 corporal and assigned to guard-duty at camp wilson.  i grabbed several buddies of mine and we got a driver and headed out for the night.  i had (as i recall; harry, butch, willy, and ? driver...?  don't recall) with me.  we made a fire and ate "c-rats" and sat around shooting the bull...

afterward we had metal folding chairs and we leaned them up against the side of the hut and sat back to watch nothing but desert....  guard duty is a long and boring duty, but we were all great friends and had each other to keep us occupied and amused.

btw; to set the record straight now, there was absolutely no drugs or alcohol involved whatsoever; it is a serious offense leading to nasty consequences!

so after maybe half an hour of sitting back and staring at the horizon and mountain range several miles in the distance (it was now fully dark out) we we noticed a red light flip on as if someone had turned on a switch.  it just appeared!  no one said a word...  at first we just assumed it was a helo (helicopter) on night maneuvers... but suddenly it moved left to right in a nanosecond covering several miles.  "did you see that...?" one of us said...  "hell yea! what was it...?"  "i dunno... maybe a helo...?"  "nfw, a helo can't move that fast!"  then as quickly it shot back to the original point; literally in the blink of an eye it moved!  on a good day, with the wind at it's back a helo takes several seconds to move that distance, and not from a dead-stop!  this happened a couple times and although we were probably a couple miles we didn't hear a sound!

after maybe 20-30 minutes the light shot straight up and was gone.  again, a help can't move that fast!  harriers can't move that fast!

here's where it gets really weird!  shortly after this light was out-of-sight, one of the 5-ton dump trucks about 20 yards started!  the engine just started!  i mean out of nowhere the engine started!  but there was no one around but me and my guys, and we were all accounted for!  now laugh all you want, but as i said earlier, we were on a secure marine corps base miles from any roads.  and no one in their right mind is going to sneak around the desert at night to start a diesel engine!  we looked for foot prints heading from and to the desert and found nothing!  we looked all over the area and found nothing!  this is a desert, it's not easy to run and hide!  and even if it had been some buddies pulling a prank, they'd have shown themselves after the fun and games had worn off!  no, there was no one there...  i can't stress enough, we were in the middle of nowhere and access was basically limited to one road in and out back them.

so back to the drugs and alcohol, we never discussed this with anyone simply because we were marines and didn't want to have people thinking we were crazy or had been doing drugs and or booze while on guard duty!  i'll bet to this day the other guys have forgotten it ever happened...

every once in awhile i'll be watching something about ufo's and recall my experience in the desert.  totally unexplained....
content.summary: Bright red dot appeared out of nowhere at marine corps base 29 palms ca

content.detailedDescription: In 1992 in the month of october i was traveling from ponce to san juan using the new highway that was built. it was approximately 9:00 pm. i had been expecting to see a flying saucer all that day as i had purposely gone to the lake cartagena area where there had been frequent sightings but the day went by and nothing happened. as it started getting dark i headed home to san juan. i was still watching the sky on my way home. i saw a red light come out of the clouds to the west and it headed straight for me. i stopped the car on the side of the road to watch the light. the flying saucer vehicle descended and hovered right in front of my vehicle slowly moving from west to east making sure that i got a good look at it.  i continued watching it travel slowly from west to east.When it got far enough away i started on my way home. the vehicle turned and followed me for about 5 minutes then disappeared. it was a larger craft than what i saw in 1973 and it had spinning blades on the bottom. it also had portholes on the dome and different colored lights coming out of the portholes as there is something spinning in the center of the craft. i have reported my previous sighting but i submitted diagrams with this report. the most important thing that i realized is that whomever was guiding this craft knew my thoughts and knew that i was looking to see a flying saucer that day.
content.summary: There were something like fins spinning on the bottom

content.detailedDescription:
Was out watering flowers when i looked up and noticed a cylinder shaped object (again) that caught my attention. after watching it it changed from silver looking to glowing very bright white on both ends. it did this twice while i was observing it. the actual front of this object lit up first followed by the end lighting up. the dark strip in the middle of it did not glow and remained very dark. the second time it "glowed" both ends illuminated at the same time. i am saying again because i saw and reported another cylindrical object looking the same as this one a few years back. as a matter of fact i think that the direction was the same as before. that first sighting did not have the object glowing though. 
i am really "confused" because for some unknown reason i keep forgetting to report this sighting. i am always looking up and very interested in these things. i made sure this "glowing" could not have been from the sun setting. the sun was already at the horizon and could have in no way been making the object appear to glow from the sun reflecting off of it. the color changed to very bright white light dimmed and lit up again. i did not have time to run into the house to retrieve a camera. it was out of my sight in about 10-15 seconds. a plane at this altitude would have taken much longer to go that distance so i'm reporting that it was going very fast.
it was be about an inch long and was about the same elevation as planes.
content.summary: Cylindrical object flying ne when it pulsated a white glow twice. had a dark line in middle of object

content.detailedDescription: I worked for the rock river times at that time. it was a tuesday night. pulbication of the paper happens on weds, so we were all there late finishing layout. i left office around 2:30 am. i took kishwaukee rd. home to stillman valley. as i came up the last hill towards town, i saw all these lights floating around in the corner of the cornfield so i pulled over to see what the heck. i pulled over on the opposite side of the road and walked across, getting closer. i watched them for a few mins, zipping this way and that, backwards and forwards, diagonally. they seemed to be playing w each other. i couldnt see any other features other than balls of light. i only felt awe, and fervently hoped and waited for another car to come and verify what i was seeing. after abt 20 mins sisterhooderving them float around, no other cars came and they seemed to be breaking up the meeting, several flew off in their own directions. i decided to follow one. i got back in my car and followed one of the balls of light all the way into town, where it turned east. i followed it east until the edge of town on rt. 72 where i lost sight of it. none of them flew very high, maybe 40 ft off the ground at the highest. i told my grampa of it in the morning and asked him if there was a remote helicopter flying club in the area that would fly them so early. he laughed at me and told me about his own ufo encounter in minnesota in 1940. my sister witnessed almost the exact same thing on the same road in nov 2011 at abt 11:30pm, in a cornfield across the street from where i had seen them. she had 4 friends in the car and they all witnessed them. some of her friends were so freaked they havent visited since, and my sister refuses to drive on kishwaukee rd for 2 years after that.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Saw 20-30 large basketball sized balls of light interacting in corner of cornfield.

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting in back yard with my wife - 11:30 pm 
saw the object appear - told my wife - we both witnessed same decscription above .
content.summary: Orb appeared bright red orange pulsating moved slowly, stopped,  moved again/ away seeming to shrink slowly and disappear

content.detailedDescription: Saw a light from my balcony while observing the stars. the light was bright and it began to pulsate. the light starting working back and fourth with no noise. the light shot away at a very fast speed. i thought it could be a satalite, i believe this object to be a ufo.
content.summary: Pulsating and waving

content.detailedDescription: At 7:31 pdt i saw an object that i was watching as i drove home from watering my garden and orchard on a rural road, what i saw shocked me. i saw a sphere that had an elongated equator that was very reflective...Its sw face reflection caught my eye as mirror like, reflecting the sun, it was hard to view it. the object was about 600 feet above sea level, about 600 yards away at a 60 degree angle, it did not emit a sound, as i was down wind at a flank. what smoked my head was that i was watching it after parking my pick-up, was watching it as i walked at a fast pace, heard a car coming to my right, looked to the car while walking, as i passed a 30 ft tall conifer, looked back and the object was gone
content.summary: Metalic sphere with an equator elongation that reflected the sun

content.detailedDescription: The past 3 nights in the east sky of me i have looked up at the stars as i normally do.  i have seen a star like object that steadily moved across the sky and was as bright as the north star.  it lasted about 20 second.  i first thought airplane but it had no wing flasher lights.  it then dimmed more and more and vanished out of the sky completely.  i sat there dumbfounded and watched the sky for a good 15 min after seeing nothing return with no clouds in the sky.  made me feel very small and a little eerie at the same time.   a bit exciting but fearful.  i just want some sort of explanation but i'm sure i'll never get one.
content.summary: Star like object bright then dimming and disappears.

content.detailedDescription: My daughter looked into the night sky and she saw it. she showed to me and my son and i ran outside and video taped it and took the photos. that thing was bouncing up and down, left and right. there were pulsated amber lights around that thing while it was hovering. then, it flew in high speed se. that thing flew so fast, we had never seen something like that.
content.summary: Hard to describe, we have never seen something like that

content.detailedDescription: Very bright, and quick. no flashing lights. smaller lights coming and going from large bright object.This happens often and usually object traveling west to east????
content.summary: Nightly high altitude lights. my wife and i see them all the time. usually travelling west to east. worth a look! i wish i could get a closer look. need a telescope. not a sat or airplane. not a star or spot in our eyes. please come and watch.

content.detailedDescription: I saw the object close to doctor arnaldo avenue, city of sao paulo, in the beginning it was right above us, (me and my friend) remained stationary for more than 10 minutes and soon after lights flashing (going from intense red to white, and when it begins to move turned blue through to green. the object was heading north traveling a long distance, then disappeared after the pacaembu football stadium. whole sighting took in around 13 to 15 minutes
content.summary: Red ball of light

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home as i turned down my street my girlfriend and i noticed a bunch of red lights in the sky. i knew it wasn't an airplane or helicopter because the way they were all moving and there wasn't any blinking lights and there were planes in the sky with them so they were obviously not planes. all of them were red. they started in a scattered vertical line then all started to scatter in different directions. then one by one they just disappeared.
content.summary: 6-10 red lights that were hovering around then slowly dissaperaed

content.detailedDescription: june 11th 2015 approx. 7pm i was in montego bay jamaica, holiday inn sunspree building 7 room 7428. im standing on my balcony to take a picture of our last sunset, i noticed a black dot on the sun. i took camera down to see with my naked eye what the black dot was. i seen nothing. i then checked the lens of the camera for dirt or any obstructions which there was none. i looked back through my camera at sunset and the dot was still there. i moved camera away from my view to again check sun with my eyes, again i seen nothing. so for few seconds i juggle my sight from naked view of sun to viewing through the camera as i was dumbfounded as to what was happening. i took few photos , then took few of other areas to see if the black dot would show up, it didn't . i then took more of the sun to confirm it was actually there and not my camera. after concerning myself with this i called my wife out to see if she saw anything covering the sun. i didn't mention what i was capturing i just asked if there was anything in the sky or in the sun. all she saw was a beautiful sunset. i then showed her what i was seeing . she as well was dumbfounded. there was no noise. we couldn't see it with naked eye only on the go pro. we sat and watched it for 7_10 minutes, then went back in our rooms as we had dinner reservations. we took pictures almost every sunset but this is nthe only one that we saw this. we were there for 7 days june 5-12.When i got home i immediately downloaded pictures to see if i did indeed capture it and i did. that's when i noticed the red orange orb that was only present in the pictures containing the object.  don't know what this is or could be hopefully you can help as i just want to know what this is.
content.summary: Taking picture of sunset , noticed object in front of the sun

content.detailedDescription: Typical tourist side-trip to zion after visiting bryce canyon. object(s) unseen until reviewing cellphone pictures later in the car on the way home. my first reaction was,what the heck is that? was something on the mountain reflecting in the camera lens, unobserved by me when i took the picture? this was unusual in that it was a cloudy day. any actions or motions were unobserved. reactions were all after the fact.  object was never seen visually, with or without the camera.
content.summary: Typical tourist picture taking. orbonly seen in cellphone after reviewing pictures later.

content.detailedDescription: I went out to the front of the house to have a smoke, when i glanced up this bright object caught my eye, i kept looking at it then i pulled out my cell phone and took a video of it, first as it was flying west to east then as it curved it's flight path and flew north. you can here my cousin taking in the background he thought it might be a drone but it flew to slow for that and it made no noise, plus drones don't look light a sliver pill capsule. i lost sight as the object flew north i have a second video clip of it. i was dumb founded when i saw this object never seen a craft like it, it was to large for a balloon, had to be about the size of a refrigerator. i'm sending this report using my cell phone for some reason it won't let me up load the 2 video clips.
content.summary: Saw a bright object flying west, at about 7 pm, still bright outside, then it slowly flew north.The clouds where floating west so it flew againts the air current.

content.detailedDescription:
On march 8, 2015, our family went model rocket launching, with some missiles reaching above 2000 feet.   

in later review, some of the images showed a bright white object near a descending rocket/parachute and a dark, blurry shape in a flyby behind car and family.  all must have been noiseless except for the rocket motors as nobody noticed anything unusual at the time.

at rocket altitude, the glowing object in the images seemed to hold position in the wind, as the rocket descended, drifting northward. a later serial frame shows the rocket and object spreading apart.  the object was not rocket wadding, which is dull brown and blew in this case past the rocket. nor was there any payload aboard.

the dark motion-blurred-appearing object passing by in the background shows, with averted vision, a central vertical structure and bulge.

i am preparing to test the hypothesis that the rockets were somehow noticed.

in several launch session, i have yet to see aircraft over the site.

total number of witnesses, after the fact, was one.
content.summary: Examination of images taken during a day of model rocket launching revealed at least two objects.

content.detailedDescription:
I was mowing grass when i noticed a bright large star in the nw sky about half the size of the sun it started getting smaller and before it disappeared a object came out of it. 
it kept getting closer and getting larger as it came my direction it moved slow and by the time it got even to me i was facing north and it was about 1000 feet above the trees but it was so huge it didn't matter.
it was round with a clear dome inside the dome were skyscrapers of all sizes i could see windows on them. the middle was solid of black it had circles which looked like could be doors of some sort and the middle part had large long antennas is what they looked like , but from the bottom of this craft hung another city not covered by a dome large skyscrapers again. 
but as it moved slowly in front of me it suddenly disappeared i kept watching and about 30 seconds later it reappeared just a little further to the east in its straight line path it stayed visiable for another minute then disappeared again and i didn't see it again after that.
content.summary: A bright light in the day in the nw out of light came a object that was so big the clear dome on top had a city in it and city hanging below

content.detailedDescription:
Note: i was mildly intoxicated at time, but i am usually intoxicated & can obviously tell any difference between reality and any visual effects substances can induce. 

it was about 1 am when i had just gotten home from a friends house. i went outside to my backyard to lay on my hammock and smoke and stargaze, as i do just about every night. i was laying there looking up at the sky when i see a bright star dancing (moving back and forth, moving in circles, then disappearing briefly and showing up in a different spot). i ran inside as fast as i could to get my nikon camera, and ran back outside. it was still dancing and moving around, so i layed back on my hammock to get some good pictures, as the ufo was directly above that spot. i took a few pictures and tried to take a video, but the video quality wasnt good enough to pick up on the ufo from that far away. note in one of the pictures the ufo looks like a lightning bolt of sorts, this is not from me shaking the camera, as i was laying down & holding the camera still; it was in the process of moving from spot to spot i believe. the ufo did the same things for about an hour before just disappearing. it was very exciting and interesting to watch & am glad i got these photos to share.
content.summary: Saw ufo dancing in sky, ran to get camera, took 4 pictures & watched it til it disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: It was around 10.30 pm one december night 1981 in warrington, england. i'd just got off a bus and was making my way home after seeing my boyfriend. whilst i was walking down my avenue, i noticed a big ball of what looked like lava traveling across the sky. it was massive and my first thought was, it must be a piece of meteorite. but as i watched it, i realised that it was perfectly round and seemed to be moving as if it was being motored across the sky. i didn't feel scared, i just couldn't understand what i was witnessing. it travelled high across the rooftops and disappeared from my view behind houses. i remember, i ran the rest of the way up to my house and burst into the lounge, where my mum and dad were watching tv and told them, what i had seen. i thought maybe something would be on the news about it the next day, but nothing was ever reported. i can still see it in my mind and have always wondered what i'd seen, all those years ago and if anyone else had witnessed seeing it too.
content.summary: I witnessed a lava sphere travelling in a straight, level line across the sky, well above the roof tops.

content.detailedDescription: Having dinner with 2 others beside the sea at bodrum castle. i turned around to take a photo of the bay, the sun was close to setting and the view was pretty. as i took the photo i noticed the time was 19:19. i took a shot and observed the photo immediately - i noticed a distinct and almost shiny object in the sky that i hadn't seen with my bare eye. immediately looked at the sky but saw nothing there. myself and my acquaintances felt any bird or human aero would still be in eye shot. the speed of anything leaving eye shot would have to have been split second. the photo, upon zooming in, shows what appears to be a craft with a metallic shell. we heard nothing.
content.summary: Unidentified object caught on camera near bodrum castle

content.detailedDescription: I looked outside my window in the backyard and a big black bug coming out its month was a unknown camera
content.summary: I looked outside my window in the backyard and a big black bug coming out its month was a unknown camera

content.detailedDescription:
I have thought about this event a lot over the years. it would be good to be able to recall what happened to me, but i have never had a clue.
in the spring semester of 1979 i took the gre entrance exam for graduate school. there were three parts to the exam. when my test results arrived i went over them with one of my professors. i asked him what the third section of the test was and he told me it was the analytical part of the test. i asked him what the test result meant and he told me that i was in the top 2% of individuals that took the gre the same time i did across the united states. i asked him if the universities only wanted the other two, why did we even take the third part and he didn't know.
after i started graduate school at auburn university, there were two separate occasions when i woke up feeling like i could barely drag myself to class. i felt lethargic and slightly drugged. on the back of my right hand was a mark, both times, there was a 1/4 inch mark that looked like a gear. it had teeth on the outer circle and a x in the middle. it was like a brand affecting just the top layer of skin, so it was brownish in color. it did not hurt and i tried to scratch it off. it took a few days to come off. i have a strong feeling that something happened to me both times, but i have no idea what. i would very much like to find out.
content.summary: I did not see a ufo. i experienced marks on the back of my hand and felt lethargic and drugged.

content.detailedDescription:
I as in my car headed south on hwy 65 toward temple. it was about 11 at night and there were no other cars on the road. i topped a hill going down to a long straight road on a flat plain with no trees around. i could see temple off to my right about 5 miles away. as soon as i saw the orb i stopped my car and watched for a minute trying to decide what to do. it was as big as the power lines were tall and was hovering above them on the left side of the road. it was a glowing soft white orb. since i was in the middle of nowhere i decided to floor it and even if it affected my engine i could coast on through. not the smartest move, but that is what i did. as i drew near the orb it moved to hover over the road. as i drove under it my car was illuminated but was not affected. i looked in my rear view mirror and it had moved over to the opposite side of the road and was just hovering. i kept right on going. and that is all there is to it.
i was shook up. it stayed in the same spot until i got into town and lost sight of it.
content.summary: The orb was hovering over the power lines on the left side of the highway. as i passed by it moved across the road direwctly above me.

content.detailedDescription: I had just got into my car and drove to my work vehicle where my paper work was located. i usually do this when i work after hours. in the sky i noticed something. instantly i thought it was some   helicopter activity. but after a second or so i realized it was something else i was witnessing. i was watching 7 to 8 lights in the north west direction over mt. wilson just north of sierra madre.The lights were a yellow gold color. similar to the color of fog lights that usually light beach cities. the lights changed position and seemingly switch places but collectively within a specific air space. after a few seconds of this the lights begin accelerating at a high speed in the northern direction disappearing over the mountains. i was shocked and couldn't believe my eyes.
content.summary: 7 or 8 lights hovering and changing positions. then taking off to the north over mountains.

content.detailedDescription:
I was up on devils mountain with friends.  while they were around the fire i moved off to the peak of the mountain which was about50-100yrds away from the camp fire.  i really enjoy viewing the stars and wanted a better view away from the fire and the rest of the group.  when i looked to the north i noticed that the stars seemed to fade away.  i didn't give it much thought for a bit. was looking at a constellation just to the north when the stars were fading out and a bit later come back.  as this event continued i began to see what might be a outline of something in the sky.  when it was nearly over me i was able to see the outline of this object. soon after that i was able to detect a boomerang shape to the object.  i had to really look to see this thing as the body of the ship just seemed a dark area in the sky and if you were not trying to see it...You wouldn't.  this ship made no noise, nor wobble, nor shift direction. it was going straight south.  i saw nothing come from it or enter it.  no lights of any kind.  what i saw was a boomerang shaped very very large object going from the north to the south, in what seemed at a very slow speed. once it was going past me i noticed two things...First,  it was in fact going at a fast speed and second it was very very large..Did i already say that.  once it had passed i just stared at the sky wondering if i had really seen something and do i tell anyone.  after a brief period i realized that i had really seen a ufo and that i could not tell anyone. back in the mid 60s one didn't tell anyone of things like this as you would be laughed at and put down..The funny farm for you.  i thought about this event every day for a long time.  i knew i had seen a ufo because 1. the size was far far larger then anything we had or anyone had..I know, ive already said that. 2.Once i realized the speed i knew that anything we have that could go that speed was a jet fighter.  this object was many times larger than a jet fighter(i began to realize it was hundreds of times larger then a fighter..No one had something like this)..Ok i said it again, but it was large.  3. the silence of this ship was even quieter than a blimp...No noise period.  

   over the next few days i started to wonder many things. where was it going, where did it come from, do we need to be afraid, who was in it, does anyone else know of this, can i tell anyone about this, i really really really want to see this craft up close, in the day time, on the ground.  i want to go inside, go to mars and saturn.  i want to see the people and talk to them. maybe get a gift from them.

  that was how i felt and do to this day when i think about it.  my hands are shaking and i feel cold.  after 50 yrs i still get goose bumps when thinking about it. still wonder what they were doing and does our government know about them, and should i say anything...Just keep my mouth shout like ive done all these years.

  i am sorry i could not or would not say anything until now.  i didn't know what would happen to me or my family.  my stepdad scared me, the government scared me a lot more. as i know "they have very long arms"

   i wish i could tell you more but it would be going over the same thing i just told you.  it was dark, the object was dark, it lasted just 5mins or less. thanks for having this site for people like me.  i really hope more people come out.  i want the government to tell the truth, so it bothers some people..Get over it.  the catholic church has even come out and said there are others out there.  we can handle it.  ok then..Just tell me.  let me see those aliens you have and the documents you have and the films.  i wont tell anyone..Really.  like that well ever happen.  

  thanks again and keep up the great work.  best wishes, dan
content.summary: Was on devils mtn and was observing the sky.  just saw the stars fade as it passed uder them

content.detailedDescription: I was preparing to take my grandson to school, when i noticed what i at first thought was a plane because it was leaving a trail behind it. but i then noticed it was not a plane-it had no wings. as i watched it, it began to change shape, it started to shrink length-wise until it was more like a square. but the square seemed to be composed of 2 separate sections. after a couple of minutes, it flew out of sight.(right before i saw the rectangle, i saw an orb-separate report).
content.summary: Observed flying white rectangle change shape.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way to work, traveling north on peach orchard road at approx. 10:45pm. it was a rainy overcast night, although it wasn't raining at this time.I was sitting at the intersection of peach orchard and bungalow roads, preparing to take a left onto bungalow road.Straight ahead approx. 500 feet peach orchard veers to the right, and all you can see is trees straight ahead.Above the treeline where you lose sight of peach orchard, a disc shaped ufo came floating out of the fog, moving straight down the middle of the road, straight towards my car sitting in the middle turn lane. i estimate the size to be 20 feet because its sides extended halfway into the lanes bordering the middle turn lane. i estimate it was floating 35 feet above the road. it was not spinning. there were red, orange-yellow lights around the perimeter. because the lights shone on the craft itself, i could tell the craft was metallic and was not completely flat.
when it got within approx. 35ft of my car, it started to move off to my right. i took a left onto bungalow rd and an immediate right into the lot of a (closed)store facing peach orchard rd. it was straight ahead from this position and i tried to find my cell to take a picture. but i lost sight of it when it started to descend below the roof line of a business. i could have quickly traveled across the road to see if it landed behind the building, but whether out of fear or something else-all i remember feeling/thinking was 'i have seen what i was meant to see' and i proceeded to work. i didn't say anything about what i saw for some time.What really blows my mind is this ufo presented itself in the middle of a good sized city, 35 ft. above the road!However, the fact i was the only one at that intersection at that time is in itself highly strange.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A disc shaped ufo with lights came out of a fog, floated approx. 25 feet above road straight towards my car, then floated off to my right and descended below treeline behind a building

content.detailedDescription: Sitting by the lawn of bryant park, facing south, when i took a photo of the empire state building jutting out among the buildings on 40th st. i didn't notice the object when i was aiming my cell phone camera and didn't notice it after. i didn't see it at all until i looked at the photo. it wasn't a advertisement banner dragged by an aircraft because it wasn't there when i looked up the sky to take the photo. and i don't think nyc allows banner-dragging aircraft over manhattan.
content.summary: Took a photo of buildings and ufo was in it
